title: Tetritskaro “Squirrel Park”
about: Tetritskaro "Squirrel Park" is located in Kvemo Kartli region, in the city of Tetritskaro, on Tamar Mepe (Tamar Queen) Street. It is one of the best places in town for relaxation. The park is equipped with walking paths, recreational chairs, playground, sports and children's attractions and a small fountain. The garden is totally in greenery that makes it more attractive. You can spend wonderful time with friends and family here. Perennial trees, fresh air, beautiful moles and well-equipped infrastructure make "Squirrel Park" one of the most pleasant places in Tetritskaro.
